casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. John E. TICKLES
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-2121 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 9, 2018

Writ not considered. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances"

*457that would justify bypassing that level of review.
